text: U tekh, kotoryye ne priznavali Nashi znameniya, nisposlannyye poslannikam dlya rukovodstva lyudyam, i schitali lozh'yu, chto predstanut pered Nami v Sudnyy den', otritsaya voskresheniye i vozdayaniye, - besplodnymi budut deyaniya, ot kotorykh oni zhdut pol'zy. Dlya nikh budet tol'ko nakazaniye za ikh zlodeyaniya i neveriye
